data.name: ProductUrlName
data.comment: The title of the product url name property.

data.value: The url name of the product cannot be empty.

data.value: The url name of the product has some invalid characters.
data.comment: The message which warns user that url name of the product has some invalid characters.

data.value: The title of the product must be set
data.comment: The message shown to user if no title for the product has been entered.

data.name: ProductTitleTooLong
data.value: The length of the product title cannot be longer than 255 characters.
data.comment: The message shown to user if the title is longer than 255 characters.

data.name: ProductPriceCannotBeNegative
data.value: The price of the product cannot be negative.
data.comment: The message shown to the user if the price of the product is negative.

data.name: ProductWeightCannotBeNegative
data.value: The weight of the product cannot be less than zero.
data.comment: The message shown to the user if the weight of the product is negative.

data.name: ProductPriceIsInvalid
data.value: The price of the product must be a numeric value which is greater than or equal to 0 and less than 100,000,000.00; use dot "." for decimal separator; at most 2 digits are allowed right from the decimal separator.
data.comment: The message shown to the user if the price of the product is not valid.

data.name: ProductWeightIsInvalid
data.value: The weight of the product must be a numeric value which is greater than 0; use dot "." for decimal separator; at most 2 digits are allowed right from the decimal separator.
data.comment: The message shown to the user if the weight of the product is not valid.

data.name: NoProductVariationsHaveBeenCreatedYet
data.value:
What are variations?
If this product is available in more than one size, color, material, etc., you need to create variations. Each variation can have different price, SKU, description, etc.

data.name: ProductVariationsTitleFormat
data.comment: Title format for the product variations.

data.name: ProductAttributeRequired
data.comment: phrase: You must select an attribute

data.name: ProductAttributeValueRequired
data.comment: phrase: You must select a value

data.name: DuplicateProductVariationException
data.value: There is another product variation with this attribute and value combination for this product.
data.comment: The message shown to the user if the product variation information duplicates another variation of the same product.

data.name: OptionAddPrice
data.comment: Format for displaying the option price (which will be added to the base price) in drop-down

data.name: OptionSubtractPrice
data.comment: Format for displaying the option price (which will be subtracted from the base price) in drop-down

data.name: OptionZeroPrice
data.comment: Format for displaying the option price (when it is zero) in drop-down

data.name: CannotDeleteProductAttributeValue
data.value: This value cannot be deleted as a product is using it as a variation. Please delete the variation before you delete this value.
data.comment: phrase: message that gets shown to the user when deleting a product attribute value is failed due to exsisting product using the attribute / value

data.name: CannotDeleteThisProductAttributeValue
data.value: The value '{0}' cannot be deleted as a product is using it as a variation. Please delete the variation before you delete this value.
data.comment: phrase: message that gets shown to the user when deleting a product attribute value is failed due to exsisting product using the attribute / value

data.name: CannotDeleteProductAttribute
data.value: This attribute cannot be deleted as a product is using it as a variation. Please delete the variation before you delete this attribute.
data.comment: phrase: message that gets shown to the user when deleting a product attribute failed due to exsisting product using the attribute

data.name: CannotDeleteThisProductAttribute
data.value: The attribute '{0}' cannot be deleted as a product is using it as a variation. Please delete the variation before you delete this attribute.
data.comment: phrase: message that gets shown to the user when deleting a product attribute failed due to exsisting product using the attribute

data.value: The quantity must be a integer value which is greater than 1

data.value: The quantity must be a integer value
data.comment: phrase: The quantity must be a integer value

data.comment: phrase: The price must be a numeric value which is greater than 0

data.comment: phrase: The price must be lower value than the base price

data.value: Tier prices should be lower than sale price to appear on the site
data.comment: Tier prices should be lower than sale price to appear on the site

data.comment: Tier pricing is a promotional tool that allows store administrators to encourage their users to buy larger quantities of a product by applying discounts based on the quantity that is ordered
